chapterTitle: A Dual Language Book of Mormon

verses.txt: Can you translate this page into the target language? Please help at the project page.
u&t is a dual-language Book of Mormon for reading verses in any two languages side by side.
Expand the menu at the top right and click the book icon to set language preferences and navigate through the books and chapters in the Book of Mormon.
Click the gear icon to specify set your preferred font size and verse layout.
Feedback is welcome at the project page.
